title: Warm Ginger and Mango Chicken Salad
ingredients: ['5 tablespoons low fat natural yoghurt', '1 1/2 tablespoons lime juice', '1 1/2 tablespoons mango chutney', '1 tablespoon rice vinegar', '1 teaspoon honey', '1/4 teaspoon ground cumin', '1/4 teaspoon ground coriander', '1/4 teaspoon ground paprika', '1 teaspoon olive oil', '4 skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets - cut into strips', '1 dessertspoon grated fresh root ginger', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 or 2 mangoes - peeled, stones removed and sliced', '1/2 red pepper, sliced', '3 spring onions, chopped', '2 heads cos (romaine) lettuce, torn']
